resources.string: At the beginning of the Universe was nothing! Completely nothing...
One could say a vacuum. But not ordinary vacuum...
That vacuum was full of emptiness...\nBut it wasn\'t the enemy for energy!
Become a Creator for a moment! Direct the particles.
It\'s an antiparticle. Makes new molecule together with a particle
It\'s also an antiparticle. But it disapears together with a particle
Click on both and connect them!
